Articles.Content: If Kerbals are treated as vessels, why don't we have them locked on screen during EVA if we set the camera view to chase mode? It would simplify things, be immersive and offer nice shots for the cinematics.
That would be useful. On a similar note, I'd really like the option to control EVA jetpacks with the same controls I use to rotate and translate ships with RCS (WASDQE and IJKLHN).
